articles.title: CPRK Urges S. Korean Authorities to Take Fundamental and Realistic Steps for National Reunification
articles.content:
CPRK Urges S. Korean Authorities to Take Fundamental and Realistic Steps for National Reunification
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released a statement on Thursday on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's reunification.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Many years have passed and old generations have been replaced by new ones since the historic day of liberation of Korea but the complete independence and sovereignty of the country have not yet been achieved though the patriotic forerunners had longed so ardently by unhesitatingly devoting themselves to the sacred anti-Japanese war.
					
					 As more than four decades of the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea have been followed by 70 years of the U.S. imperialists' presence in south Korea, the complete liberation of the nation and its sovereignty have not been achieved nationwide and the Koreans are undergoing unbearable pain and tragedy due to the protracted division of the nation forced by foreign forces.
					
					 It is the unanimous aspiration and desire of all fellow countrymen to achieve the independent reunification of the country at any cost despite any adversity and obstacle, the statement noted, urging the south Korean authorities as follows:
					
					 1. U.S. domination and interference should be terminated on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea should be withdrawn and the south Korean authorities should roll back their treacherous policy of depending on foreign forces.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to break with the U.S. and join the sacred ranks of the nation and settle the issue of north-south relations and the reunification question by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want peace and detente on the Korean peninsula, they should come out against the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the root cause of straining the regional situation, and stop staging the anachronistic "cooperation in putting pressure on the north" in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 2. The south Korean authorities should take practical steps to implement the already agreed north-south agreements.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly interested in reunification and have the willingness to improve the inter-Korean relations, they should recognize and respect the already concluded north-south agreements and take practical measures for implementing them, not peddling anything frequently whenever the regime is replaced by another.
					
					 The humanitarian work, the rejoining of railways and roads and social cooperation called for by the south Korean authorities will be satisfactorily settled if the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are implemented as they are reflected in those declarations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should show before all fellow countrymen their sincere will to improve the relations with the DPRK through their practical actions, not talking only.
					
					 3. It is necessary to take realistic steps to put an end to the hostile acts between the north and the south and pull down the barriers lying in the way of reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of the DPRK to boldly terminate harmful hostile acts.
					
					 For the present, the projected north-targeted Ulji Freedom Guardian war drills should be cancelled unconditionally as they will push the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war and increase the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should remove as soon as possible unreasonable institutional mechanisms blocking the contact, visits, cooperation and exchange between the north and the south.
					
					 They should take a substantial measure to pull down the concrete wall, a product of the Cold War and the confrontation with fellow countrymen, before talking about "confidence" and "a peace park".
					
					 They should join all the fellow countrymen in the nationwide march to greet with splendor the 70th anniversary of the liberation of Korea as a grand festival of national reunification to be specially recorded in the history of the nation in hearty response to the offer of the DPRK.

articles.title: Indonesian President Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Indonesian President-elect Meets DPRK Government Delegation
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Indonesian president-elect Joko Widodo had a friendly talk with the DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to the country at the Jakarta City Office on August 13.
					He regards it as a pride that Jakarta and Pyongyang have established relations of sister cities, he said, adding he paid deep attention to the relations with the DPRK in the past.
					
					He affirmed that Indonesia would make positive efforts to further expand and develop the relations with the DPRK in the political, economic, cultural, educational and other various fields after his assumption of office as president.
					
					Present there were those concerned of the Jakarta City Office and the Foreign Ministry, the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Indonesian President-elect Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Indonesian President-elect Meets DPRK Government Delegation
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Indonesian president-elect Joko Widodo had a friendly talk with the DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to the country at the Jakarta City Office on August 13.
					 He regards it as a pride that Jakarta and Pyongyang have established relations of sister cities, he said, adding he paid deep attention to the relations with the DPRK in the past.
					
					 He affirmed that Indonesia would make positive efforts to further expand and develop the relations with the DPRK in the political, economic, cultural, educational and other various fields after his assumption of office as president.
					
					 Present there were those concerned of the Jakarta City Office and the Foreign Ministry, the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia and staff members of his embassy.

articles.title: Talks between FMs of DPRK and Indonesia Held
articles.content:
Talks between FMs of DPRK and Indonesia Held
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong who is heading the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Indonesia and Indonesian Foreign Minister Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa were held at the building of the Foreign Ministry of Indonesia on August 13.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia and staff members of his embassy and from the Indonesian side the director general for Asia-Pacific and Africa of the Foreign Ministry and those concerned.
					
					 At the talks both sides discussed the issues of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in various fields.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Singapore
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Singapore
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Asian countries arrived in Singapore on August 13.
					 The delegation left Jakarta on the same day after visiting Indonesia.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tributes to them.
					
					 On the same day the chief of the Paektusan Group of Spain laid a floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 They included the delegation of the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia led by Deputy Director Anatoli Kuznetsov and the delegation of the Saitama Prefectural Commercial Association of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan led by Chairperson Hwang Un Hae.
					
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders they received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Car Riding Group Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Car Riding Group Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 Members of the group laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 On the same day they laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.

articles.title: Reception Given for Car Riding Group
articles.content:
Reception Given for Car Riding Group
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots hosted a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Thursday in honor of the participants in the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula".
					 Present at the reception on invitation were members of the Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group and Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Kim Se Wan, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots, Ri Song Gon, deputy director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, and officials concerned.

Car Riding Group Arrives Here

articles.title: British Guests Here
articles.content:
British Guests Here
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the National Policy Forum of the British Labor Party, and his party arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Spanish Public Figure Here
articles.content:
Spanish Public Figure Here
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Manuel Garcia Botaya, chief of the Paektusan Group of Spain, arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Match for Examining Men's Football of National Sports Team Held
articles.content:
Match for Examining Men's Football of National Sports Team Held
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A match for examining the men's football of the National Sports Team which will take part in the 17th Asian Games was held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday.
					 The National Sports Team played the match with the Kigwancha Team.
					
					 It trounced its rival 3:0.
					
					 Among the spectators were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and other officials concerned and working people, school youth and children and football fans here.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at World Taekwon-do Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at World Taekwon-do Championships
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 11th World Junior and the 6th World Veteran Taekwon-Do Championships held in Dushanbe, Tajikistan, from August 3 to 10.
					 They participated in the junior championship.
					
					 They bagged 18 gold medals, three silver medals and seven bronze medals to be placed first in team standing.
					
					 They separately won women's team sparring, men's and women's team pattern and men's and women's self-defense matches.
					
					 Ha Kum Gwang and Sin Hyon Il separately placed first in men's above 75 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 16-17 and in the 51 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 14-15, Kim Un Hwa, Pae Kyong Sim, Kim Chong Ok and Ju Ok in women's above 70 kg, 70 kg, 58 kg and 46 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 16-17.
					
					 Kim Un Ye and Won Ok won the women's 52 kg and 46 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 14-15.
					
					 Kim Kwang Chon and Han Tae Bom won gold medals in the men's individual pattern competitions 2nd and 3rd degrees, Pae Kyong Sim, Won Ok and Kim Un Hwa in the women's individual pattern competitions 1st, 2nd and 3rd degrees.
					
					 DPRK players placed second in the men's team special technique competitions.
					
					 Pak Yong Bok and Choe Kyong Won placed second and third in the men's 45 kg and 69 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 16-17 and Pak Un Ha third in the women's  52 kg individual sparring matches.
					
					 Kim Kwang Chon and Ri Tu Song won bronze medals in the men's 57 kg and 45 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 14-15 and Ri Cho Won a bronze medal in the women's 58 kg individual sparring matches.
					
					 Kang Jin Hyok took the second in the men's pattern individual matches 1st degree and Pak Chol Rim and Pak Kum Hyang third in the men's and women's individual special technique competitions.
					
					 The junior championship brought together more than 300 men and women players from 26 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, Ukraine and Kazakhstan.

articles.title: DPRK Athletes to Attend Youth Olympic Games
articles.content:
DPRK Athletes to Attend Youth Olympic Games
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will send six athletes to the 2nd Youth Olympic Games to be held in Nanjing, China from August 16 to 28.
					 They will compete in weightlifting, wrestling and rowing events.
					
					 In the 2010 Youth Olympic Games, the DPRK athletes won a gold, a silver and three bronze medals in weightlifting, judo and diving events.
					
					 The gold medal was taken by Kim Song Chol in the 62 kg category of men's weightlifting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Liberation of Korea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Liberation of Korea
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- It is 69 years since President Kim Il Sung achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					 The liberation of Korea was a historic event that provided a fundamental turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean nation and opened up the new origin of Juche Korea.
					
					 Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of the anti-Japanese revolution in the distressed days when the destiny of the country was at stake and the existence of the nation was at peril due to the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, and declared an all-out war with the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 With neither state-backing home front nor assistance of a regular army, he forced his way through bloody battles against the Japanese imperialist aggression forces who styled themselves leader of Asia.
					
					 The liberation of Korea put an end to the dark age of distress of the nation and the Korean people could lead a new life as a full-fledged master of an independent and sovereign state.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea who built an invincible socialist power on the liberated land of Korea.
					
					 Based on the solid foundation of building an independent and sovereign state which was laid during the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolution, he built on the liberated land a new country where the people have become masters.
					
					 From the first day of the country's liberation to the last days of his great revolutionary life he energetically worked with total dedication to turn the country into a genuine people's country and the most dignified and prosperous socialist country.
					
					 Firmly maintaining the principle of independence he built the powerful driving force of the Korean revolution and led to victory two revolutionary wars, rehabilitation and construction and two stages of social revolutions and socialist construction while foiling all the counter-revolutionary offensives of the imperialists and reactionaries and the interventions by left and right opportunists.
					
					 The most advantageous socialist system centered on the popular masses was built and the DPRK turned into a socialist power, independent, self-supporting and self-reliant, in a short span of time.
					
					 The great feat for Korea's liberation performed by the President is shining along with the noble patriotic feats he performed by building socialism where the popular masses have become the masters of the state and society and everything serves them for the first time in history, genuine socialism which has become part of life of the Korean people.

articles.title: Nationwide Armed Resistance for National Liberation
articles.content:
Nationwide Armed Resistance for National Liberation
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for achieving the decisive victory in the sacred war to liberate the country on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea (August 15). 
					 After embarking upon the road of anti-Japanese revolution, Kim Il Sung set forth the unique line of nationwide armed struggle which calls for liberating the country through a nationwide, organized and active resistance war against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 In the early period of the armed struggle, he had gained much experience in putting the people of guerilla zones under arms.
					
					 On the basis of the experience, he organized the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland to develop the anti-Japanese armed struggle into a nationwide resistance.
					
					 In September Juche 26 (1937), he made public "An Appeal to Compatriots throughout Korea", which called upon all Koreans to turn out in a nationwide struggle against the Japanese invaders.
					
					 As part of preparations for all-people resistance, he advanced into Sinhung, Phungsan and other areas of the homeland with a group of the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA). 
					
					 He also inspected temporary secret bases in Mt. Kom, Kyonghung County and in Puryong County, North Hamgyong Province to indicate the ways for organizing armed corps.
					
					 Under his energetic guidance, many armed corps such as the Kkachibong People's Armed Corps in Hoeryong, the Worker-Peasant Armed Corps on Mt. Kom and the People's Armed Corps in Rajin had been formed in different parts of the homeland.
					
					 In 1942, there were more than 180 anti-Japanese underground organizations in the homeland with over half a million of people involved.
					
					 On August 9, 1945, timing with the KPRA units' general offensive towards the homeland started by the order of Kim Il Sung, armed corps throughout the country began attacking Japanese forces and police stations, thus making big contributions to accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation.

articles.title: Activities for Creating Literary Works Brisk among Schoolchildren
articles.content:
Activities for Creating Literary Works Brisk among Schoolchildren
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Activities for creating literary works are brisk among Korean schoolchildren. 
					 This year witnessed the creation of thousands of works dealing with the stirring reality of the era in which all service personnel and people are dynamically advancing for a fresh victory in the Juche revolution, united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, and noble mental spirit of the schoolchildren.
					
					 580 school youth and children were awarded the April 15 Mangyongdae creation prize of loyalty.
					
					 Their works included random thoughts "Before the Warship Rock in Mangyongdae", child poems "Snowflakes in December" and "Glow over Jujak Peak", words of song "We Miss the Generalissimos Very Much" and random thoughts "Before a Table for Operation Plan at the Supreme Command." They represent the boundless yearning for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their firm resolution to advance along the road of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Memo, diary, child poem and other works depict the bright and cheerful looks of the schoolchildren across the country who happily grow up with nothing to desire more in the world under the loving care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The schoolchildren across the country are stoutly growing up to be masters of thriving Korea possessed of high creative ability and insight through brisk creative activities.

articles.title: Book "Leader and Comrades-in-Arms in Anti-Japanese War" (1) Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Book "Leader and Comrades-in-Arms in Anti-Japanese War" (1) Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK published the book "Leader and Comrades-in-Arms in Anti-Japanese War" (1) on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The book deals with stories that President Kim Il Sung brought up passionate young intellectuals and children of workers and farmers as revolutionaries, able politico-military commanding officers and able officials in the crucible of the revolutionary struggle. It also deals with the facts proving the loyalty of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters to the President.
					
					 Under the titles "First chief of staff of our revolutionary armed forces" and "Commanding officer who remained a soldier all his life" the book tells about the efforts made by Cha Kwang Su and Kim Chaek to perform their missions and obligations as true revolutionary comrades and comrades-in-arms of the President till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The book tells about the shining life of Rim Chun Chu and Choe Chun Guk who set examples in carrying out the order of the leader as his soldiers and the path covered by Kim Song Guk, Choe Yong Jin and Kim Kyong Sok who grew up to be competent military and political officers while displaying courage in the anti-Japanese war and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It also deals with stories about Kang Wi Ryong and Im Chol who performed shining feats in devotedly defending the leader, remaining loyal to the leader, the country and its people as soldiers and Ri Kye Sun who met a heroic death, being known to posterity as a true daughter of the Korean nation and a fine model of women revolutionaries.

articles.title: Revolutionary Spirit of Self-Reliance Created during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Revolutionary Spirit of Self-Reliance Created during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) highly displayed the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					 The KPRA members built smithies in thick forests to manufacture gunpowder and bombs, repair firearms and make ammunition in the spirit of self-reliance implanted by President Kim Il Sung into their minds.
					
					 Kim Il Sung personally read reference books to find out a method to make gunpowder. And the KPRA members succeeded in making bombs which were more effective than grenade in killing power.
					
					 Kim Il Sung named the bomb Yanji bomb, as it played a big role in battles fought in Yanji County, China. 
					
					 In the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, the KPRA members tailored military uniforms by themselves and provided even medical treatment.
					
					 Thanks to the spirit, the DPRK has turned into a satellite maker and launcher as well as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK people encouraged by the spirit have put spurs to the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Unique Guerrilla Tactics (2)
articles.content:
Unique Guerrilla Tactics (2)
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung created many unique guerilla tactics during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 He had employed different tactics in battles on the basis of proper calculation of the balance of forces and geographical and weather conditions, always winning victories.
					
					 It could be well proved by the book "The Protean Anti-Japanese Guerillas" authored by a Japanese.
					
					 He appropriately combined large-unit military operations with small-unit military activities.
					
					 Among those tactics created by him were simultaneous attacks, lure-and-attack, rush-march tactics, etc.
					
					 Thanks to the unique tactics of Kim Il Sung, the Korean People's Revolutionary Army could win victories in battles against the Japanese imperialists.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Accuses Court Authorities of Their Unreasonable Decision
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Accuses Court Authorities of Their Unreasonable Decision
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on August 11 accused the puppet court authorities of their unreasonable decision on the case of the attempted rebellion.
					 That day the Seoul High Court held a trial on an appeal on the case of attempted rebellion at which it gave Ri Sok Gi a verdict of not guilty on the suspicion of the case but sentenced him to 9 years in jail and 7 years of suspension of qualifications on charges of agitating attempted rebellion and violating the "Security Law." 
					
					 One cannot but suspect this ruling was made by the court authorities for fear of consequences to be entailed by the verdict of not guilty, the editorial charged.
					
					 The trial confirmed the assertion that the case of the attempted rebellion was fabricated by the Intelligence Service, it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Authorities Slammed for Making Unreasonable Judgment
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Authorities Slammed for Making Unreasonable Judgment
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea issued a statement on August 12 denouncing the puppet court authorities' unreasonable judgment going against democracy and peaceful reunification.
					 At the second trial of the case of attempted rebellion of the Unified Progressive Party the Seoul High Court sentenced to prison terms those involved in the case on charges of the violation of the "Security Law", the statement noted.
					
					 It accused the court of making such unreasonable judgment that those indicted were guilty though it had been fully revealed that the case lacks evidence.
					
					 Recalling that the court inflicted penalties on them by invoking the "Security Law", the anachronistic evil law, in infringement upon conscience and the freedom of expression and association, the statement branded the action as one against the nation and democracy as it blocks independence and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Political Camp's Attitude Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Political Camp's Attitude Protested
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident of south Korea held a press conference outside the "National Assembly" building in Seoul on August 12 at which it protested against the puppet political camp's act of blocking the probe into the truth about the disaster, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 The agreement on the special bill on the ferry Sewol disaster reached between the ruling and opposition parties in camera is little short of a collusion seeking their political interests, the organization charged.
					
					 All those concerned including Chongwadae should be targets of survey and investigation, it held.
					
					 But the ruling and opposition parties agreed to invest a special prosecutor with the rights to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster, it said.
					
					 A proper probe into the truth about the tragedy can hardly be made, it said, urging the political camp to conduct negotiations again, though belatedly, and not to inflict any more wounds upon the bereaved families and people.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Gangsters under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Gangsters under Fire
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The command of the southwestern front of the Korean People's Army (KPA) released a report Wednesday in connection with the fact that the south Korean military hooligans committed such a serious military provocation as indiscriminately shelling fishing boats of the DPRK in the waters off the southwestern coast on Tuesday.
					 In this regard, Jo Hyang Sim, a KPA officer, told KCNA:
					
					 The south Korean military are trying to shift onto the DPRK the responsibility for the worsening situation and find a pretext for launching the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 As regards the DPRK's rocket firing drills, they were carried out in its domain and territorial waters according to a self-defensive measure. Therefore, the south Korean puppet military gangsters, hell-bent on war exercises with a nuclear carrier of the outside forces involved, have no justification to say this or that about the rocket firing drills.
					
					 What can not be overlooked is that the 17th Asian Games is to be held in the place not far from the hotspot.
					
					 They should make clear what they are seeking for through the shelling.
					
					 They should not misunderstand the patience of the KPA officers and men on the southwestern front.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Foreign Crewmen
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Foreign Crewmen
Chongjin, August 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Chongjin Port of North Hamgyong Province on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of a Cambodia-flagged ship.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said President Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of the revolution in his early years, defeated the brigandish Japanese imperialists and liberated the country.
					
					 The victory won in the fight against the Japanese imperialists, having neither state-backing home front nor getting assistance from a regular army, is ascribable to the wise leadership of the President, the invincible and iron-willed commander, they noted.
					
					 Not only the Korean people but all of us are aware well of the feats he performed by achieving the historic cause of the country's liberation, having the one million-strong Japanese imperialists under his thumb with his outstanding strategies and tactics, they said, adding:
					
					 The feats he performed in liberating the country were successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and are shining more brightly thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health for the prosperity of the Korean people and national reunification.
					
					 A letter to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded as Peerless Great Man by Korean in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded as Peerless Great Man by Korean in Japan
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Hwang Un Hae, chairman of the Saitama Prefectural Commercial Association of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), who is leading the delegation of the association said he was pleased to greet the anniversary of Korea's liberation in the socialist homeland.
					 As the anniversary is drawing near, I feel more profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung who led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to a shining victory and achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation, Hwang said, and continued:
					
					 After embarking on the road of the revolution in his early years with a lofty intention to liberate the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists, the President founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army.
					
					 History records lots of famous generals but it has never known such a great man as the President who led to victory the hard-fought anti-Japanese war and made a triumphant return home as a young general.
					
					 As they were led by him, the Korean people could accomplish the historic cause of Korea's liberation and greet a new era of prosperity as we witness today.
					
					 It was only after the liberation of the country that the Koreans in Japan who had roamed about in the alien land could live with national dignity and pride.
					
					 All the Koreans highly praise Kim Il Sung as a peerless great man and the sun of the nation.
					
					 The feats performed by Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and nation, in achieving the liberation of Korea, will always shine along with the history of the nation.
					
					 His revolutionary cause is now being successfully carried to completion thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will make a positive contribution to the development of Chongryon, prosperity of the country and the sacred cause of its reunification.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Rejected by British Organizations
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Rejected by British Organizations
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK and other progressive organizations of Britain issued a joint statement on August 9 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers' moves to invade the DPRK.
					 Referring to the scale and aggressive nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises to be kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces, the statement said:
					
					 The "tailored deterrence strategy", a scenario for preemptive nuclear strike, will be formally applied to the joint military exercises.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is nuclear war exercises to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 There is no guarantee that such exercises will not spill over to a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK is making positive efforts to defend the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. imperialists are resorting to the moves for igniting a nuclear war, a clear indication that they are the sworn enemy of the Korean people who does not want peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We appeal to the world peace-loving forces to turn out in the struggle against the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces' moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 Stop Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, get out of south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on August 3 and 9 on the occasions of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation and the Day of Songun. They included a meeting in Switzerland and a DPRK book and photo exhibition in Mexico.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were figures from various circles and masses in the relevant countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee in a speech praised the President who liberated Korea from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists as hero and father of the nation and peerless great man who performed the immortal exploits for the cause of global independence.
					
					 He said Kim Jong Il resolutely frustrated the U.S. imperialists' moves to provoke a new war, firmly defended the peace on the Korean peninsula and turned the DPRK into an invincible political, ideological and military power.
					
					 The chairman of the Nezauacoyotl City Cultural and Sports Committee of Mexico said:
					
					 I am pleased that the DPRK book and photo exhibition is being held in the city on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					
					 Through the exhibition visitors will become to know well about the undying feats performed by the President and Kim Jong Il and the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 I hope that the Korean people will as ever register greater successes in the struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Switzerland.
					
					 A lecture was given at a construction site of Conakry, Guinea and a film show took place at a factory of Guinea on August 7 and 8 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Peruvian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Peruvian Body
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The feats President Kim Il Sung performed by liberating Korea will be everlasting with the century, said the statement issued by the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Aug. 8 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 The statement continued:
					
					 The Korean people were liberated from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists on August 15, 1945.
					
					 The President is the father of the nation who set forth the original line and policy for national liberation and organized the anti-Japanese armed struggle, bringing freedom and liberation to the Korean people.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea and the Songun idea and firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and nation with his ever-victorious Songun politics.
					
					 Under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great successor to the cause of Juche and Songun, the army and people of the DPRK are achieving great successes in their efforts to frustrate the war provocations of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges and achieve national reunification and global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Putin
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 12 el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, V. V. Putin.
					El mensaje sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un,
					
					Con motivo del dia de liberacion, fiesta nacional del pueblo coreano, le extiendo a Vd. mis sinceras felicitaciones.
					
					Recordamos con reverencia a los patriotas coreanos y los militares de la URSS quienes habian luchado hombro con hombro por la independencia de vuestro pais.
					
					La tradicion de amistad y cooperacion, preparada en las decadas de la guerra severa, sirve hoy tambien de base que posibilita desarrollar con exito las relaciones Rusia-RPDC.
					
					Estoy convencido de que gracias a nuestros esfuerzos conjuntos, se ampliaran de continuo las relaciones bilaterales de socios, inclusive el cumplimiento del macroproyecto de economia e infraestructura en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Esto conviene a los intereses fundamentales de los pueblos de los dos paises y contribuira al aseguramiento de paz y estabilidad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Formulo votos por la salud y exitos de Vd. y por la felicidad y bienestar de todo el pueblo de la RPDC. 
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi alta consideracion.

articles.title: CRPP exige a autoridades surcoreanas tomar medidas para la reunificacion
articles.content:
CRPP exige a autoridades surcoreanas tomar medidas para la reunificacion
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion con motivo del 69o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea (15 de agosto).
					Aunque paso mucho tiempo y se sucedieron las generaciones desde el historico dia de liberacion de la patria desde el coloniaje japones, no se han logrado todavia la libertad e independencia total de la patria que ansiaban tanto los martires patrioticos quienes ofrendaron sin vacilacion alguna sus vidas a la sagrada guerra antijaponesa, comienza el texto.
					
					Mas de 40 anos de la ocupacion japonesa se unen con 70 anos de ocupacion militar norteamericana del territorio sureno de la patria, lamenta y agrega que por eso no se logran todavia en escala nacional la liberacion total y la soberania de la nacion.
					
					La prolongada division nacional impuesta por las fuerzas extranjeras hace sufrir a la nacion coreana intolerables penalidades y tragedias, recalca.
					
					Es unanime el anhelo de todos los compatriotas de realizar a toda costa la reunificacion independiente del pais superando cualesquier adversidades y obstaculos, afirma y declara a las autoridades surcoreanas como sigue:
					
					1. Hay que poner punto final al dominio e intervencion de EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea deben retirarse del suelo surcoreano y las autoridades surcoreanas han de abandonar su vendepatria politica de depender de las fuerzas ajenas.
					
					Urgimos a las autoridades surcoreanas separarse del regazo de EE.UU., incorporarse a las sagradas filas de la nacion y resolver de manera independiente y con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion el problema de relaciones intercoreanas y el de reunificacion.
					
					Si ellas desean de veras la paz y alivio de tension, deben rechazar la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU., causa de agravacion de la situacion regional, y no recurrir a la campana de "presionar al Norte de Corea" en cooperacion con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					2. Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tomar las medidas practicas para implementar los acuerdos Norte-Sur ya logrados.
					
					Si ellas estan interesadas de verdad en la reunificacion y el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, deben reconocer y respetar los acuerdos Norte-Sur ya logrados, en lugar de plantear cosas nuevas cada vez que cambia el "poder", y tomar las medidas practicas para ejecutarlos.
					
					La labor humanitaria, la union de ferrocarriles y carreteras y los proyectos de cooperacion social, en que insisten ellas, son asuntos reflejados ya en la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y por eso, seran resueltos plenamente una vez implementados esos documentos intercoreanos.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben demostrar a toda la nacion coreana no con palabras sino con acciones la voluntad sincera de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					3. Hay que parar los actos hostiles entre ambas partes coreanas y tomar las medidas reales para eliminar las barreras que impiden la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion.
					
					Acabar valientemente con los inutiles actos hostiles es la firme decision y voluntad de la RPDC.
					
					Por ahora, se debe suspender incondicionalmente los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC Ulji Freedom Guardian que llevan al umbral de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y aumentan el peligro de guerra nuclear.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben cancelar de inmediato los injustos aparatos institucionales que frenan el contacto, el viaje reciproco, la cooperacion y el intercambio entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Ellas deben tomar la medida sustancial de desmantelar el muro de hormigon, producto de guerra fria y confrontacion fratricida, antes de hablar de la "fe" y el "parque de paz".
					
					Al aceptar la propuesta de la RPDC, ellas deberan incorporarse a la marcha gigantesca de toda la nacion deseosa de celebrar el 70o aniversario de liberacion de la patria como gran festival por la reunificacion de la patria que se registre en letras mayusculas en la historia nacional.

articles.title: Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC publica informacion sobre el incidente de fuego artillero
articles.content:
Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC publica informacion sobre el incidente de fuego artillero
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- La Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 13 la siguiente informacion:
					El dia 12, los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano cometieron la grave provocacion militar de disparar indiscriminadamente los proyectiles contra un barco pacifico de nuestra parte que realizaba la pesca rutinaria en el mar sudoeste.
					
					Debido a ese imprudente acto provocador, la situacion de la zona maritima ya delicada llego a la coyuntura a punto de explosion en que no se puede prever nada.
					
					La gravedad del caso esta en que esos piratas cometieron la presente provocacion segun el plan trazado previa y minuciosamente.
					
					5 lanchas rapidas, infiltradas una tras otra en lo profundo de las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC, ejecutaron el indiscriminado canoneo contra nuestro barco pesquero mientras sobrevolaban la zona del incidente los cazabombarderos tipo F-16. Anteriormente, ya se habia decretado el estado de alerta conjunta en las unidades terrestres, maritimas y aereas del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC conocen de sobra la sucia intencion de los gangsteres militares surcoreanos.
					
					Con el mencionado acto provocador, esos ultimos tratan de distraer la atencion de la opinion publica centrada ahora en el "incidente de asesinato a un soldado bisono de apellido Yun", producto de la vulnerabilidad del ejercito surcoreano, carne de canon para la guerra de agresion de EE.UU., y de la corrupta sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Ellos se encuentran ahora en una situacion tan miserable debido a ese incidente, comparado como "el hundimiento del ferry Sewol sucedido en el circulo militar", y a los sucesivos casos de indisciplina y escandalos en las filas del ejercito.
					
					Igualmente pretenden inducir con la imprudente provocacion de canonazos en las aguas mas cadentes la contramedida autodefensiva del EPC con el fin de preparar un pretexto del desarrollo de los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					La situacion dada va a romper hasta la ultima cuerda tensa de la paciencia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC.
					
					Castigar despiadadamente las islas Paekryong, Yonphyong, Taechong, etc. en que estan escondidos los gangsteres de la capa militar titere para tomar las aguas cadentes del Mar Oeste como punto de combustion de la provocacion belica y sepultar en lo profundo del mar los barcos piratas que frecuentan la intrusion en nuestras aguas territoriales sagradas, esto es la incontenible voluntad de represalia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC.
					
					Precisamente en estas aguas los enemigos libran con frenesi y frecuencia disparos y canonazos, arrastraron a nuestros pesqueros para cometer la barbaridad bestial contra ellos y suelen cometer el acto de intrusion en las aguas territoriales.
					
					No deben olvidar que nuestros canones, apuntando los nidos principales de provocacion, esperan el momento de castigarlos sin piedad.
					
					Es invariable la voluntad de represalia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC de convertir los imprudentes canonazos de los provocadores en la salva en honor de difunto que anuncia la muerte final.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no deben juzgar erroneamente la paciencia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC.

articles.title: Desarrollara relaciones de amistad con Corea, subraya presidente indonesio
articles.content:
Desarrollara relaciones de amistad con Corea, subraya presidente indonesio
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Presidente de la Republica de Indonesia, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono departio el dia 13 en el palacio presidencial con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Ri Su Yong, de visita en ese pais asiatico.
					En la ocasion el presidente indonesio dijo que continuar y desarrollar invariablemente las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises preparadas por el Presidente Sukarno y Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung es la firme posicion de Indonesia.
					
					Refirio que el pueblo coreano tiene fuerte fuerza espiritual y prosiguio que en el futuro tambien Indonesia hara todos los esfuerzos por ampliar y desarrollar el intercambio y la cooperacion con la RPDC en la politica, la economia, la cultura y otras ramas.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro Coordinador para la Politica, Ley y Asuntos de Seguridad, el ministro Coordinador para Asuntos Economicos, el secretario de Estado, el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, etc., asi como el embajador y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica de la RPDC en Indonesia.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea e Indonesia
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea e Indonesia
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 13 en la sede del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica de Indonesia las conversaciones entre el canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Ri Su Yong, quien preside la delegacion gubernamental de visita en Indonesia, y su homologo indonesio, Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa.
					Participaron en la ocasion por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion, el embajador y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana en ese pais, y por la indonesia, el director general para Asia-Pacifico y Africa y otros funcionarios del MINREX. 
					
					Ambas partes discutieron los temas sobre la ampliacion y desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises en varios dominios.

articles.title: Joko Widodo expresa voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con la RPDC
articles.content:
Joko Widodo expresa voluntad de desarrollar relaciones con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente electo de la Republica de Indonesia, Joko Widodo, departio el dia 13 en la municipalidad de Yakarta con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presidida por el canciller Ri Su Yong, de visita en ese pais.
					En la ocasion el dijo que esta orgulloso del hermanamiento entre Yakarta y Pyongyang y anadio que ha prestado en el pasado profunda atencion a las relaciones con la RPDC.
					
					Afirmo que despues de la toma de posesion, se esforzara mucho por ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones con la RPDC en la politica, la economia, la cultura, la educacion y otras ramas.
					
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios de la municipalidad de Yakarta y el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el embajador y otros miembros de la Embajada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en Indonesia.

articles.title: Llega a Singapur delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
articles.content:
Llega a Singapur delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Ri Su Yong, que realiza una gira por paises asiaticos, llego el dia 13 a la capital de la Republica de Singapur.
					El mismo dia, la delegacion partio de Yakarta tras concluir su visita a la Republica de Indonesia.
